title: Satyagraha
summary: Satyagraha (Hindi pronunciation: [səˈtjɑ.ɡɹə.hə]; Sanskrit: सत्याग्रह; satya: "truth", āgraha: "insistence" or "holding firmly to"), or "holding firmly to truth",[1] or "truth force", is a particular form of nonviolent resistance or civil resistance. Someone who practises satyagraha is a satyagrahi.
